alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 5:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Walton County through 515 PM CDT... At 442 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Eglin Air Force Base to near Niceville. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, New Home, Portland, Villa Tasso and Rock Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
